title: truffle debug error: Cannot read property 'binary' of undefined
body:
## Issue

I've encountered an issue which I do not know how to debug with this error message:
`(node:4399) UnhandledPromiseRejectionWarning: Unhandled promise rejection (rejection id: 1): TypeError: Cannot read property 'binary' of undefined`

[code](https://github.com/rustamakhmetov/safe_ico/tree/debug_bug1)

## Steps to Reproduce

1. `truffle compile`
2. `truffle develop`
3. `migrate --reset`
4. `MainICO.deployed().then(function(instance) { return instance.sendTransaction({ from: web3.eth.accounts[0], gas: 50000, value: web3.toWei(0.001, "ether") });}).then(function(result) { console.log(result); })`
5. `debug [transaction]` 

## Expected Behavior

lets me debug

## Actual Results

Gathering transaction data...

(node:4399) UnhandledPromiseRejectionWarning: Unhandled promise rejection (rejection id: 1): TypeError: Cannot read property 'binary' of undefined

## Environment

* Operating System: Mac
* Ethereum client:
* Truffle version (`truffle version`): Truffle v4.1.5 (core: 4.1.5), Solidity v0.4.21 (solc-js)
* node version (`node --version`): v6.11.5
* npm version (`npm --version`): 3.10.10

[actual code for this error](https://github.com/rustamakhmetov/safe_ico/tree/debug_bug)

After the upgrade: [npm 5.6.0, node v9.10.1], with the same actions I get the error:

Gathering transaction data...

Addresses affected:
 0x79473f448cbb30ce862dc69ef84d0268b7d48dcc - Stage1ICO
 0x7153ccd1a20bbb2f6dc89c1024de368326ec6b4f - MainICO

Commands:
(enter) last command entered (step next)
(o) step over, (i) step into, (u) step out, (n) step next
(;) step instruction, (p) print instruction, (h) print this help, (q) quit
(b) toggle breakpoint, (c) continue until breakpoint
(+) add watch expression (`+:<expr>`), (-) remove watch expression (-:<expr>)
(?) list existing watch expressions
(v) print variables and values, (:) evaluate expression - see `v`

(node:3630) UnhandledPromiseRejectionWarning: TypeError: Cannot read property '23' of undefined
    at /usr/local/lib/node_modules/truffle/build/webpack:/~/truffle-debugger/dist/debugger.js:559:1
    at Array.forEach (<anonymous>)
    at /usr/local/lib/node_modules/truffle/build/webpack:/~/truffle-debugger/dist/debugger.js:546:1
    at /usr/local/lib/node_modules/truffle/build/webpack:/~/reselect/lib/index.js:76:1
    at /usr/local/lib/node_modules/truffle/build/webpack:/~/reselect/lib/index.js:36:1
    at /usr/local/lib/node_modules/truffle/build/webpack:/~/reselect/lib/index.js:90:1
    at Function.<anonymous> (/usr/local/lib/node_modules/truffle/build/webpack:/~/reselect/lib/index.js:36:1)
    at args (/usr/local/lib/node_modules/truffle/build/webpack:/~/reselect-tree/index.js:171:1)
    at /usr/local/lib/node_modules/truffle/build/webpack:/~/reselect/lib/index.js:86:1
    at Function.<anonymous> (/usr/local/lib/node_modules/truffle/build/webpack:/~/reselect/lib/index.js:36:1)
    at args (/usr/local/lib/node_modules/truffle/build/webpack:/~/reselect-tree/index.js:171:1)
    at /usr/local/lib/node_modules/truffle/build/webpack:/~/reselect/lib/index.js:86:1
    at Function.<anonymous> (/usr/local/lib/node_modules/truffle/build/webpack:/~/reselect/lib/index.js:36:1)
    at args (/usr/local/lib/node_modules/truffle/build/webpack:/~/reselect-tree/index.js:171:1)
    at /usr/local/lib/node_modules/truffle/build/webpack:/~/reselect/lib/index.js:86:1
    at /usr/local/lib/node_modules/truffle/build/webpack:/~/reselect/lib/index.js:36:1
    at Session.view (/usr/local/lib/node_modules/truffle/build/webpack:/~/truffle-debugger/dist/debugger.js:2672:1)
    at printFile (/usr/local/lib/node_modules/truffle/build/webpack:/~/truffle-core/lib/commands/debug.js:116:1)
    at /usr/local/lib/node_modules/truffle/build/webpack:/~/truffle-core/lib/commands/debug.js:444:1
    at <anonymous>
    at process._tickCallback (internal/process/next_tick.js:118:7)
(node:3630) UnhandledPromiseRejectionWarning: Unhandled promise rejection. This error originated either by throwing inside of an async function without a catch block, or by rejecting a promise which was not handled with .catch(). (rejection id: 1)
(node:3630) [DEP0018] DeprecationWarning: Unhandled promise rejections are deprecated. In the future, promise rejections that are not handled will terminate the Node.js process with a non-zero exit code.

I'm also seeing this error after upgrading from Truffle v4.1.3. I'm attempting to debug a transaction on the Rinkeby network. Before I upgraded Truffle, it was telling me that it was unable to show the source code for any of the contracts involved. Not sure why, but it's probably relevant.

Here's a bit more of the stack trace in case that helps:

```
Gathering transaction data...

redux-saga error: uncaught at session.saga
at session.saga
 TypeError: Cannot read property 'binary' of undefined
    at recordContracts$ (/Users/kriskelly/.nvm/versions/node/v8.9.1/lib/node_modules/truffle/build/webpack:/~/truffle-debugger/dist/debugger.js:3288:1)
    at tryCatch (/Users/kriskelly/.nvm/versions/node/v8.9.1/lib/node_modules/truffle/build/webpack:/~/regenerator-runtime/runtime.js:62:15)
    at Generator.invoke [as _invoke] (/Users/kriskelly/.nvm/versions/node/v8.9.1/lib/node_modules/truffle/build/webpack:/~/regenerator-runtime/runtime.js:296:1)
    at Generator.prototype.(anonymous function) [as next] (/Users/kriskelly/.nvm/versions/node/v8.9.1/lib/node_modules/truffle/build/webpack:/~/regenerator-runtime/runtime.js:114:1)
```

Pretty sure it's this function: https://github.com/trufflesuite/truffle-debugger/blob/3c2ae1e0c980f9aef0ac1ec79d4d7b7108e83c39/lib/session/sagas/index.js#L83 and if so, it's iterating over undefined contracts.

I have the same error message when I just change function name in a contract, to try new feature in v4.0.0 "Debug transactions without code". Backing previous name allows me to debug transaction without any issues.

## Environment

* Operating System: OS X
* Ethereum client: truffle develop
* Truffle version (`truffle version`): Truffle v4.1.5 (core: 4.1.5) Solidity v0.4.21 (solc-js)
* node version (`node --version`): v9.2.1
* npm version (`npm --version`): 5.8.0

Thanks for reporting this issue everyone.

Closing as duplicate of trufflesuite/truffle-debugger#51
